item.title: After Tom Holland And Jon Bernthal Helped Each Other Audition For Their Marvel Projects, I Need The MCU To Deliver On The Superhero Team-Up I've Wanted For 9 Years
item.description: Tom Holland and Jon Bernthal auditioned for Marvel together, and the pair could finally star in a project together since Bernthal's in the MCU.

item.title: 10 Upcoming 2025 Action Movies That Could Blow The Doors Off The Box Office
item.description: 2025 is shaping up to be a massive year for action movies, from superhero films from the MCU and DCU to the return of long-awaited series like Tron.

item.title: The Oldest Hollywood Movie Currently On Netflix Is Just 52 Years Old, But Is Definitely Worth Watching
item.description: The oldest English-language movie on Netflix is only from 1973, but it's still a great film and definitely worth watching half a century later.
